definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: The following is the text of Senator Clinton's letter today to the Secretary of the Army.
sentences.chinese: 全文如下參議員克林頓的一封信，今天陸軍大臣。

sentences.english: I just received a terribly grhvacious cisl from Sen. McCain.
sentences.chinese: 剛剛，麥凱恩參議員很有風範地給我打了個電話。

sentences.english: There was more  name-calling in the campaign for senator than I ever heard before.
sentences.chinese: 在那次參議員競選中相互謾罵之多是我聞所未聞的。

sentences.english: You know, councillor, the Manx parliament.
sentences.chinese: 您曉得，參議員，是曼克斯議會。

sentences.english: Senators Kennedy and Packwood shake their heads when they walk past you.
sentences.chinese: 參議員肯尼迪和伍德路過你時，搖搖頭。

sentences.english: I have won more of the popular vote than Senator Clinton. I have more delegates than Senator Clinton.
sentences.chinese: 我比克林頓參議員贏得了更多的黨內代表的票數。

sentences.english: Finally, he called the name of the senator from Kansas.
sentences.chinese: 最後，首席大法官叫到了這位堪薩斯州參議員的名字。

sentences.english: The senator's activity kept him in the public eye.
sentences.chinese: 參議員的活動使他常處於衆目睽睽之下。

sentences.english: Philippines Senator Aquilino Pimentel says ASEAN countries also are in a position to help.
sentences.chinese: 菲律賓參議員皮門特爾說，東盟國家也可以提供幫助。

sentences.english: These must be some illiterate ignorant and clueless Senators.
sentences.chinese: 這些參議員肯定是文盲蠢蛋毫無頭緒的。

sentences.english: Dear Mr. Congressman or Senator, what shall I give up first?
sentences.chinese: 親愛的國會議員或參議員，我該首先放棄哪一部分呢？

sentences.english: Senator Simpson merely looked the deep things that he thought.
sentences.chinese: 參議員辛浦生只在考慮自己心裏不可告人的事情。

sentences.english: Hispanic senators have been few and far between, as have Hispanic governors.
sentences.chinese: 西語裔的參議員和州長更是鳳毛麟角。

sentences.english: But Senator McCain is looking ahead to a post-Gadhafi Libya.
sentences.chinese: 但是麥凱恩參議員卻在展望後卡扎菲時代的利比亞。

sentences.english: A hard-core group of right- wing senators had hoped to sway their colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 一羣骨幹右翼參議員曾企圖左右自己的同僚。

definition: member of the US House of Representatives
chair (or president, speaker etc) of national congress
(Tw) Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, president 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
governor (of a province or colony)/US state governor/premier (Australian states)
